DOC.brief_title: Study Implantable Functional Neuromuscular Stimulation System Patients With Spinal Cord Injuries
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients undergo surgery electrode suture area pelvis leg . Electrode lead insert receiver/stimulator implant subcutaneous pocket abdomen . Following implantation , patient undergo train standing , transfer , advance mobility skill use functional neuromuscular stimulation system . Restricted activity continue 2 week surgery , follow 8 week exercise . Standing training begin , continue 6 week . Home-based training follow prior discharge system spontaneous use . Patients follow 3 , 6 , 12 month , annually thereafter .
